svg.text: Build research on diversity, inclusion, and equity in planning, economic, and housing policy
Interview transgender subjects in mixed-methods study measuring travel stress

text.tspan: ess levels on during travel using GPS, eye tracking, and biometrics

svg.text: Performed ﬁscal and market analysis to support the new 150-unit mixed use Eastern Tower
Community Center and the 20,000-attendee annual Night Market (
Served the Chinatown community through workshops, events, and direct engagement
Assessed parking needs through policy review and a survey of 100+ Chinatown stakeholders
Advise the City of Philadelphia on Vision Zero policy aiming to eliminate trafﬁc deaths by 2030
Compile, analyze, and visualize crash data on the High Injury Network using R and ArcGIS
Prepare strategies to build consensus for Vision Zero among community members and the city
Present 40+ new planning and safety practices for Philadelphia city agencies
Marshalled over 30,000 riders in the Five Boro Bike Tour and other local events
Gave instruction on bicycle use, repair, and maintenance as part of BNY’s free programming
Independently executed a capital assessment study to direct investment in EV charging,
integrating transportation policy concerning complete streets, climate action, and safety

text.tspan: orked alongside planners and engineers, supporting p
ojects including signal timing for Bus

svg.text: Rapid Transit, dockless bike share and electric scooter permits, and interactive webmaps
Mapped and analyzed transportation networks for ConnectSF, a 50-year transportation plan
congestion, ﬂood and wildﬁre risk, housing code violations, and bike share rebalancing
Optimize predictions and wrangle large public data sets (1M+ rows) in R, JavaScript, and ArcGIS
Build video presentations, visualizations, and interactive webmaps to convey ﬁndings
Facilitate engagement for Citi bike Phase III expansion into upper Manhattan
Demographic, spatial, and equity analyses using Excel and data from ACS, NHTS, Uber, etc.
Support transportation mgmt during LGA airport construction, including dashboards, basemaps
Created a comprehensive plan for Southwest Philadelphia, population 60,000
Analyzed and presented data on demographics, economy, environment, and community
Designed graphs, charts, and maps using ArcGIS, Adobe InDesign, and Adobe Illustrator
Cycled 4,000 miles over eleven weeks from Jacksonville, FL to Monterey, CA
Helped raise $500,000 for affordable housing, distributed to local non-proﬁts
Constructed affordable housing in communities of need in nine US cities
